SELECT msmz.nombre, msmz.nombre_col_past, mz.nombre AS nombre_zona, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_supervision ms WHERE ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ) AS cant_supervisiones, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_celula mc JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision WHERE ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ) AS cant_celulas, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision WHERE rol = 'Miembro' AND ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ) AS miembros, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision WHERE rol = 'Asistente' AND ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ) AS asistentes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_cristiano c JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision WHERE ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ) AS total FROM mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz LEFT JOIN mae_zona mz ON msmz.idzona = mz.idzona ORDER BY msmz.idsector_ministerio DESC
